commit.message:
Rollup merge of #94577 - RalfJung:simd-miri, r=scottmcm

only disable SIMD for doctests in Miri (not for the stdlib build itself)

Also we can enable library/core/tests/simd.rs now, Miri supports enough SIMD for that.

verification.payload:
tree a24c9303359498be1bdc6a33b68edbf39f1c9228
parent afa85f08410aaa874f628c2704818ef2fb126f00
parent 50e7450bac9fd9faafb7adb7540ab07ddea896d1
author Dylan DPC <99973273+Dylan-DPC@users.noreply.github.com> 1646431114 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1646431114 +0100

Rollup merge of #94577 - RalfJung:simd-miri, r=scottmcm

only disable SIMD for doctests in Miri (not for the stdlib build itself)

Also we can enable library/core/tests/simd.rs now, Miri supports enough SIMD for that.

files.patch:
@@ -408,12 +408,12 @@ pub mod arch {
 #[allow(missing_debug_implementations, dead_code, unsafe_op_in_unsafe_fn, unused_unsafe)]
 #[allow(rustdoc::bare_urls)]
 #[unstable(feature = "portable_simd", issue = "86656")]
-#[cfg(not(all(miri, doctest)))] // Miri does not support all SIMD intrinsics
+#[cfg(not(all(miri, doctest)))] // Skip SIMD doctests in Miri
 mod core_simd;
 
 #[doc = include_str!("../../portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/core_simd_docs.md")]
 #[unstable(feature = "portable_simd", issue = "86656")]
-#[cfg(not(all(miri, doctest)))] // Miri does not support all SIMD intrinsics
+#[cfg(not(all(miri, doctest)))] // Skip SIMD doctests in Miri
 pub mod simd {
     #[unstable(feature = "portable_simd", issue = "86656")]
     pub use crate::core_simd::simd::*;

@@ -1,5 +1,3 @@
-#![cfg(not(miri))] // Miri does not support all SIMD intrinsics
-
 use core::simd::f32x4;
 
 #[test]
